text: Kreshnik Fazliu (; born 5 September 1984), known professionally as MC Kresha, is a Kosovar rapper and songwriter. == Life and career == Fazliu has published his album "United States of Albania", in collaboration with other Albanian rappers in 2019. == Personal life == He is also a diehard Liverpool Fc fan, expressing his admiration for David Beckham and Roy Keane. == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Mitrovica, Kosovo Category:Kosovan rappers Category:21st-century Albanian rappers Category:Kosovo Albanians Category:Kosovan people of Albanian descent
title: MC Kresha
